author: Staff Reporter
text:
Activists of the People’s Welfare Front (PWF) on Saturday staged a demonstration in front of the head post office here protesting against the registration of a sedition case against senior leaders of the CPI (M) and CPI.

The agitators led by R. Rajangam, secretary of the CPI (M), demanded the withdrawal of the case against CPI (M) general secretary Sitaram Yechury, CPI national secretary D. Raja and other leaders named in the FIR. They also raised slogans against the Centre and said that it was suppressing freedom and democratic rights in the country.
title: PWF activists protest sedition charges
